greetings.wanna_do: Ano ang gusto mong gawin ngayong araw?

settings.title: System Settings
settings.language_help: Select the language for menus, messages, and other system text. This will affect all users of this device.
settings.color_mode_help: Choose a color scheme for the system interface.

view_grades.h2: View your current grade report and see your improvement, and other metadata.

current_classes.h2: View your current classes for this semester.

view_classes.h2: View, edit, and delete classes in this current semester.

new_report.h2: Create grade reports on a chosen class.

view_reports.h2: View previously filed reports on your classes.

users_list.h2: List all students, teachers and staff currently registered in the system.

invitation_resend.title: Resend Invitation
invitation_resend.desc: In order to resend another invitation link, please enter your details below. If we found a record that matches the information that you have provided, we will send the new invitation in your school email address.

pw_reset.title: I-reset ang iyong password
pw_reset.desc: Para makapagpadala ng password reset link, ilagay ang iyong username o Numero ng ID. Kung merong rekord ang system na nagtutugma sa impormasyon na iyong itinala, magpapadala kami ng email na naglalakip ng link para i-reset ang iyong password.

footer.desc: GradeX is a capstone project made to fullfil the requirements for Practical Research 2. Read more about our research paper

new_pw.invalid: Napaso na ang reset password link na ito.
new_pw.invalid_info: Ang link na ito ay napaso o hindi wasto. Tingnan uli ang link na nakalakip sa naipadalang e-mail at subukan muli, o magpadala ng bagong link.
